name: Tramplino
description:
A local multiplayer game that pits three players against each other! Your goal is to bump into other players to try to knock them off the trampoline. The trampoline shrinks over time, so try to stay on. Last person to survive for three rounds wins!

Player 1 Controls: WASD

Player 2 Controls: Arrow Keys

Player 3 Controls: Numpad Arrow Keys

Made in Unreal Engine
